channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi -- Hitachi Storage Provider for VMware vCenter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi -- Hitachi Storage Provider for VMware vCenter

item.title: CVE-2024-22385|2024-08-01T22:43:34.581Z -- hitachi -- hitachi%20storage%20provider%20for%20vmware%20vcenter
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Hitachi Storage Provider for VMware vCenter allows local users to read and write specific files.This issue affects Hitachi Storage Provider for VMware vCenter: from 3.1.0 before 3.7.4.
